amendatorysection.catchline: Reserves, refuges, and sanctuaries; signs; form; where placed; defacing prohibited; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: At each section corner and in full sight of the traveled highway at each game reserve, bird refuge, or wild fowl sanctuary, there shall be placed by the commission a conspicuous, permanent sign as follows:

row.entry: Hunting or Molesting Game or Bird Life
or with such other notice as the commission may deem advisable.
Anyone removing or defacing any such sign shall be deemed guilty
